LanguageData.Cutebold_Adaptation_WearingGoggles: Goggles currently worn, no workspeed change.
LanguageData.Cutebold_DarkAdaptation_StatPercentStrin: Extra Percentage: +{0} ({1} (Raw Extra Percentage) x {2} (Adaptation, 100% max))
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_ResourceCheckbox: Cutebolds are able to extract extra resources (requires restart):
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_ResourceCheckbox_SYR_H: [SYR] Harvest Yield enabled, using that instead.
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_ResourceCheckbox_ToolT: Humans mis... didn't miss a spot?
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_DarkAdaptation: Cutebolds can adapt to see in the dark (requires restart):
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_DetachableParts: Cutebold ears and tail will be visually gone when the body part becomes lost:
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_DetachableParts_ToolTi: No ears or tail make a sadbold.
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_EyeGlow: Cutebolds eyes glow when dark adapted:
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_Ideology_Darkness: Cutebold adaptation when darkness ideology is used: (requires restart)
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_Ideology_Darkness_Cute: Cutebolds become adapted to the darkness.
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_Ideology_Darkness_Hybr: Cutebolds become adapted to the darkness, but don't go below 100% workspeed in bright light.
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_DBH_Patches_Tooltip: Cleanbolds!\n\n(Allows for baby cutebolds to be washed.)
LanguageData.Cutebold_Settings_CheckPatches: Check for all patches to methods that this mod patches (used for debugging):
